body_html:
I followed the instructions on a clean Raspberry Pi build and ran into this issue, which I fixed using the patch to the Makefile, but now am getting this when trying to compile the label_image program as per the instructions:

$ make -f tensorflow/contrib/pi_examples/label_image/Makefile  CXX=g++-4.8
g++-4.8 --std=c++11 -O0 -I/usr/local/include -I. -I/home/pi/tensorflow/tensorflow/contrib/pi_examples/label_image/../../makefile/downloads -I/home/pi/tensorflow/tensorflow/contrib/pi_examples/label_image/../../makefile/downloads/eigen/ -I/home/pi/tensorflow/tensorflow/contrib/pi_examples/label_image/../../makefile/gen/proto/ -I/home/pi/tensorflow/tensorflow/contrib/pi_examples/label_image/../../makefile/gen/proto_text/ -c tensorflow/contrib/pi_examples/label_image/label_image.cc -o /home/pi/tensorflow/tensorflow/contrib/pi_examples/label_image/gen/obj/tensorflow/contrib/pi_examples/label_image/label_image.o
In file included from tensorflow/contrib/pi_examples/label_image/label_image.cc:26:0:
/usr/include/jpeglib.h:774:3: error: ‘size_t’ does not name a type
   size_t free_in_buffer; /* # of byte spaces remaining in buffer */
   ^
/usr/include/jpeglib.h:786:3: error: ‘size_t’ does not name a type
   size_t bytes_in_buffer; /* # of bytes remaining in buffer */
   ^
In file included from /usr/include/jpeglib.h:27:0,
                 from tensorflow/contrib/pi_examples/label_image/label_image.cc:26:
/usr/include/jpeglib.h:817:3: error: ‘size_t’ has not been declared
   JMETHOD(void *, alloc_small, (j_common_ptr cinfo, int pool_id,
   ^
/usr/include/jpeglib.h:819:3: error: ‘size_t’ has not been declared
   JMETHOD(void FAR *, alloc_large, (j_common_ptr cinfo, int pool_id,
   ^
In file included from tensorflow/contrib/pi_examples/label_image/label_image.cc:26:0:
/usr/include/jpeglib.h:964:34: error: ‘size_t’ has not been declared
 EXTERN(void) jpeg_CreateCompress JPP((j_compress_ptr cinfo,
                                  ^
/usr/include/jpeglib.h:966:36: error: ‘size_t’ has not been declared
 EXTERN(void) jpeg_CreateDecompress JPP((j_decompress_ptr cinfo,
                                    ^
/usr/include/jpeglib.h:974:30: error: ‘FILE’ has not been declared
 EXTERN(void) jpeg_stdio_dest JPP((j_compress_ptr cinfo, FILE * outfile));
                              ^
/usr/include/jpeglib.h:975:29: error: ‘FILE’ has not been declared
 EXTERN(void) jpeg_stdio_src JPP((j_decompress_ptr cinfo, FILE * infile));
                             ^
tensorflow/contrib/pi_examples/label_image/label_image.cc: In function ‘tensorflow::Status LoadJpegFile(std::string, std::vector<unsigned char>*, int*, int*, int*)’:
tensorflow/contrib/pi_examples/label_image/label_image.cc:108:32: error: cannot convert ‘FILE* {aka _IO_FILE*}’ to ‘int*’ for argument ‘2’ to ‘void jpeg_stdio_src(j_decompress_ptr, int*)’
   jpeg_stdio_src(&cinfo, infile);
                                ^
tensorflow/contrib/pi_examples/label_image/label_image.cc: In function ‘int main(int, char**)’:
tensorflow/contrib/pi_examples/label_image/label_image.cc:318:3: error: ‘vector’ was not declared in this scope
   vector tensorflow::Flag > flag_list = {
   ^
tensorflow/contrib/pi_examples/label_image/label_image.cc:318:3: note: suggested alternatives:
In file included from /usr/include/c++/4.8/vector:64:0,
                 from tensorflow/contrib/pi_examples/label_image/label_image.cc:29:
/usr/include/c++/4.8/bits/stl_vector.h:210:11: note:   ‘std::vector’
     class vector : protected _Vector_base<_Tp, _Alloc>
           ^
/usr/include/c++/4.8/bits/stl_vector.h:210:11: note:   ‘std::vector’
tensorflow/contrib/pi_examples/label_image/label_image.cc:318:10: error: expected ‘;’ before ‘tensorflow’
   vector tensorflow::Flag > flag_list = {
          ^
tensorflow/contrib/pi_examples/label_image/label_image.cc:333:52: error: ‘flag_list’ was not declared in this scope
   string usage = tensorflow::Flags::Usage(argv[0], flag_list);
                                                    ^
tensorflow/contrib/pi_examples/label_image/label_image.cc:335:8: error: in argument to unary !
   if (!parse_result) {
        ^
tensorflow/contrib/pi_examples/label_image/label_image.cc:341:49: error: cannot convert ‘std::string {aka std::basic_string<char>}’ to ‘const char*’ for argument ‘1’ to ‘void tensorflow::port::InitMain(const char*, int*, char***)’
   tensorflow::port::InitMain(usage, &argc, &argv);
                                                 ^
tensorflow/contrib/pi_examples/label_image/Makefile:79: recipe for target '/home/pi/tensorflow/tensorflow/contrib/pi_examples/label_image/gen/obj/tensorflow/contrib/pi_examples/label_image/label_image.o' failed
make: *** [/home/pi/tensorflow/tensorflow/contrib/pi_examples/label_image/gen/obj/tensorflow/contrib/pi_examples/label_image/label_image.o] Error 1

Anyone have any ideas? Master is at c6af51e

I followed the instructions on a clean Raspberry Pi build and ran into this issue, which I fixed using the patch to the Makefile, but now am getting this when trying to compile the label_image program as per the instructions:
$ make -f tensorflow/contrib/pi_examples/label_image/Makefile  CXX=g++-4.8
g++-4.8 --std=c++11 -O0 -I/usr/local/include -I. -I/home/pi/tensorflow/tensorflow/contrib/pi_examples/label_image/../../makefile/downloads -I/home/pi/tensorflow/tensorflow/contrib/pi_examples/label_image/../../makefile/downloads/eigen/ -I/home/pi/tensorflow/tensorflow/contrib/pi_examples/label_image/../../makefile/gen/proto/ -I/home/pi/tensorflow/tensorflow/contrib/pi_examples/label_image/../../makefile/gen/proto_text/ -c tensorflow/contrib/pi_examples/label_image/label_image.cc -o /home/pi/tensorflow/tensorflow/contrib/pi_examples/label_image/gen/obj/tensorflow/contrib/pi_examples/label_image/label_image.o
In file included from tensorflow/contrib/pi_examples/label_image/label_image.cc:26:0:
/usr/include/jpeglib.h:774:3: error: ‘size_t’ does not name a type
   size_t free_in_buffer; /* # of byte spaces remaining in buffer */
   ^

                                  ^

tensorflow/contrib/pi_examples/label_image/label_image.cc: In function ‘tensorflow::Status LoadJpegFile(std::string, std::vector<unsigned char>*, int*, int*, int*)’:
tensorflow/contrib/pi_examples/label_image/label_image.cc:108:32: error: cannot convert ‘FILE* {aka _IO_FILE*}’ to ‘int*’ for argument ‘2’ to ‘void jpeg_stdio_src(j_decompress_ptr, int*)’
   jpeg_stdio_src(&cinfo, infile);
                                ^
tensorflow/contrib/pi_examples/label_image/label_image.cc: In function ‘int main(int, char**)’:
tensorflow/contrib/pi_examples/label_image/label_image.cc:318:3: error: ‘vector’ was not declared in this scope
   vector tensorflow::Flag > flag_list = {
   ^
tensorflow/contrib/pi_examples/label_image/label_image.cc:318:3: note: suggested alternatives:
In file included from /usr/include/c++/4.8/vector:64:0,

     class vector : protected _Vector_base<_Tp, _Alloc>
           ^
/usr/include/c++/4.8/bits/stl_vector.h:210:11: note:   ‘std::vector’
tensorflow/contrib/pi_examples/label_image/label_image.cc:318:10: error: expected ‘;’ before ‘tensorflow’
   vector tensorflow::Flag > flag_list = {
          ^
tensorflow/contrib/pi_examples/label_image/label_image.cc:333:52: error: ‘flag_list’ was not declared in this scope
   string usage = tensorflow::Flags::Usage(argv[0], flag_list);
                                                    ^
tensorflow/contrib/pi_examples/label_image/label_image.cc:335:8: error: in argument to unary !
   if (!parse_result) {
        ^
tensorflow/contrib/pi_examples/label_image/label_image.cc:341:49: error: cannot convert ‘std::string {aka std::basic_string<char>}’ to ‘const char*’ for argument ‘1’ to ‘void tensorflow::port::InitMain(const char*, int*, char***)’

body:
I followed the instructions on a clean Raspberry Pi build and ran into this issue, which I fixed using the patch to the Makefile, but now am getting this when trying to compile the label_image program as per the instructions:

``` bash
$ make -f tensorflow/contrib/pi_examples/label_image/Makefile  CXX=g++-4.8
g++-4.8 --std=c++11 -O0 -I/usr/local/include -I. -I/home/pi/tensorflow/tensorflow/contrib/pi_examples/label_image/../../makefile/downloads -I/home/pi/tensorflow/tensorflow/contrib/pi_examples/label_image/../../makefile/downloads/eigen/ -I/home/pi/tensorflow/tensorflow/contrib/pi_examples/label_image/../../makefile/gen/proto/ -I/home/pi/tensorflow/tensorflow/contrib/pi_examples/label_image/../../makefile/gen/proto_text/ -c tensorflow/contrib/pi_examples/label_image/label_image.cc -o /home/pi/tensorflow/tensorflow/contrib/pi_examples/label_image/gen/obj/tensorflow/contrib/pi_examples/label_image/label_image.o
In file included from tensorflow/contrib/pi_examples/label_image/label_image.cc:26:0:
/usr/include/jpeglib.h:774:3: error: ‘size_t’ does not name a type
   size_t free_in_buffer; /* # of byte spaces remaining in buffer */
   ^
/usr/include/jpeglib.h:786:3: error: ‘size_t’ does not name a type
   size_t bytes_in_buffer; /* # of bytes remaining in buffer */
   ^
In file included from /usr/include/jpeglib.h:27:0,
                 from tensorflow/contrib/pi_examples/label_image/label_image.cc:26:
/usr/include/jpeglib.h:817:3: error: ‘size_t’ has not been declared
   JMETHOD(void *, alloc_small, (j_common_ptr cinfo, int pool_id,
   ^
/usr/include/jpeglib.h:819:3: error: ‘size_t’ has not been declared
   JMETHOD(void FAR *, alloc_large, (j_common_ptr cinfo, int pool_id,
   ^
In file included from tensorflow/contrib/pi_examples/label_image/label_image.cc:26:0:
/usr/include/jpeglib.h:964:34: error: ‘size_t’ has not been declared
 EXTERN(void) jpeg_CreateCompress JPP((j_compress_ptr cinfo,
                                  ^
/usr/include/jpeglib.h:966:36: error: ‘size_t’ has not been declared
 EXTERN(void) jpeg_CreateDecompress JPP((j_decompress_ptr cinfo,
                                    ^
/usr/include/jpeglib.h:974:30: error: ‘FILE’ has not been declared
 EXTERN(void) jpeg_stdio_dest JPP((j_compress_ptr cinfo, FILE * outfile));
                              ^
/usr/include/jpeglib.h:975:29: error: ‘FILE’ has not been declared
 EXTERN(void) jpeg_stdio_src JPP((j_decompress_ptr cinfo, FILE * infile));
                             ^
tensorflow/contrib/pi_examples/label_image/label_image.cc: In function ‘tensorflow::Status LoadJpegFile(std::string, std::vector<unsigned char>*, int*, int*, int*)’:
tensorflow/contrib/pi_examples/label_image/label_image.cc:108:32: error: cannot convert ‘FILE* {aka _IO_FILE*}’ to ‘int*’ for argument ‘2’ to ‘void jpeg_stdio_src(j_decompress_ptr, int*)’
   jpeg_stdio_src(&cinfo, infile);
                                ^
tensorflow/contrib/pi_examples/label_image/label_image.cc: In function ‘int main(int, char**)’:
tensorflow/contrib/pi_examples/label_image/label_image.cc:318:3: error: ‘vector’ was not declared in this scope
   vector tensorflow::Flag > flag_list = {
   ^
tensorflow/contrib/pi_examples/label_image/label_image.cc:318:3: note: suggested alternatives:
In file included from /usr/include/c++/4.8/vector:64:0,
                 from tensorflow/contrib/pi_examples/label_image/label_image.cc:29:
/usr/include/c++/4.8/bits/stl_vector.h:210:11: note:   ‘std::vector’
     class vector : protected _Vector_base<_Tp, _Alloc>
           ^
/usr/include/c++/4.8/bits/stl_vector.h:210:11: note:   ‘std::vector’
tensorflow/contrib/pi_examples/label_image/label_image.cc:318:10: error: expected ‘;’ before ‘tensorflow’
   vector tensorflow::Flag > flag_list = {
          ^
tensorflow/contrib/pi_examples/label_image/label_image.cc:333:52: error: ‘flag_list’ was not declared in this scope
   string usage = tensorflow::Flags::Usage(argv[0], flag_list);
                                                    ^
tensorflow/contrib/pi_examples/label_image/label_image.cc:335:8: error: in argument to unary !
   if (!parse_result) {
        ^
tensorflow/contrib/pi_examples/label_image/label_image.cc:341:49: error: cannot convert ‘std::string {aka std::basic_string<char>}’ to ‘const char*’ for argument ‘1’ to ‘void tensorflow::port::InitMain(const char*, int*, char***)’
   tensorflow::port::InitMain(usage, &argc, &argv);
                                                 ^
tensorflow/contrib/pi_examples/label_image/Makefile:79: recipe for target '/home/pi/tensorflow/tensorflow/contrib/pi_examples/label_image/gen/obj/tensorflow/contrib/pi_examples/label_image/label_image.o' failed
make: *** [/home/pi/tensorflow/tensorflow/contrib/pi_examples/label_image/gen/obj/tensorflow/contrib/pi_examples/label_image/label_image.o] Error 1
```

Anyone have any ideas? Master is at c6af51e2cee6ecbc1b4bb30de129d2b07a381120
